page.title: 10BAYSTON HILL FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: My weekends are never empty they are always full with things to do.On Saturday I woke up it was a lovely sunny morning so I jumped out of bed already fully awake and hurriedly got dressed and went out to play. Presently I heard Mum calling me in for breakfast I scoffed that down and flew out to play with my friends. I jogged down to Ella's house and asked her down to mine.We played on my scrambling net and we had a game of swingball.I was called in for dinner. Ella went home. After dinner my family and I hopped into the car.We drove to Church Stretton to have a walk.After our walk we drove to the Little Chef to have our tea. I was tired so we went home to bed.
